meta.content: DISTRICT News/Resources Library During COVID-19 Crisis
LAST UPDATED: April 21, 2020 Dear Hilltopper Community, In accordance with Governor Mike DeWine's executive order for schools throughout the State of Ohio, ALL CHARDON SC

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.span: Search

h1.span: DISTRICT News/Resources Library During COVID-19 Crisis

span.div: In accordance with Governor Mike DeWine's executive order for schools throughout the State of Ohio, ALL CHARDON SCHOOL BUILDINGS ARE CLOSED TO STUDENTS (for ALL activities) MONDAY MARCH 16, 2020 THROUGH THE DURATION OF THE 2019-20 ACADEMIC CALENDAR. This closure encompasses not only traditional academic instruction in our buildings but also ALL Chardon Local Schools athletics, extracurricular, and club activities, etc.
span.p: We will continue to use the Blackboard email system to communicate major updates pertaining to the closure and the 2019-20 school year. District Blackboard emails will continue to be cross-referenced to:

a.span: Facebook page
Twitter page

span.strong: FOOD SERVICE PROGRAM (LUNCH) for CHARDON STUDENTS & SIBLINGS

a.span: April 12, 2020 - Blackboard Email: TWO (2) UPDATES to Lunch PICKUP Program

br.em: [The above April 12, 2020 document describes an important change from three pickup sites to TWO (2) pickup sites, as well as a Day change for one site. Please review all details carefully.]

span.strong: Questions or Unable to Locate a Resource?

div.br: Reach out to communications@chardonschools.org, and we are glad to answer your question(s) and/or direct you to resources.

span.div: If you have a class-specific question, please reach out to your child's teacher. Building-specific requests can be directed to your building administrator. When in doubt, reach out and we are glad to help.

div.em: [April 3, 2020 UPDATE: The Chardon Schools Treasurer's Department continues to address additional events. Announcements about any further cancellations or postponements, including refund processes, will be posted here as the details become available.]

strong.span: Chardon High School Prom has been rescheduled to July 10, 2020 at the same venue (American-Croatian Lodge in Eastlake)

strong.span: Thank you Hilltopper Families for working with us during this unique period in time as we strive to serve all Hilltoppers well in our new (and temporary) venture of emergency remote learning during the COVID-19 pandemic.
